directions: In a bowl, gently stir together tomatoes, avocados, onion, and garlic. Mix in parsley and oregano. Gently stir in olive oil and vinegar. Then stir in feta. Cover, and chill for 2 to 6 hours.
ingredients: 1 ripe avocado - peeled, pitted and chopped
1 tablespoon red or white wine vinegar
title: Avocado Feta Salsa
